titleStmt.title: The Most Virtuous and Godly Susanna
titleStmt.author: Garter, Thomas

titleStmt.title: The commody of the moste vertuous and godlye Susanna neuer before this tyme printed. Compiled by Thomas Garter. Eyght persons may easyly play it. 1. The Prologue and the Saylour for one. 2. Ioachim and Iudex for another, 3. Sathan and Uoluptas another, 4. Sensualitas alone. 5 Susanna alone. 6. Helchia, True Report, Ancilla, another, 7. Ill Reporte the uyce, and Cryer, another. 8. Helchias wyfe, Danyell, Seruus, Serua, for another.
titleStmt.author: Garter, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate, beneath the Conduite, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by Hugh Iackson,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The commody of Susanna.
Identified as STC 11632a on UMI microfilm reel 644.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
